color: #333333; font-family: freight-sans-pro-n4, freight-sans-pro; font-size: 15px; line-height: normal;

strong.span: COLCHESTER is NOW a LOCATION for
COVID-19 Community-wide Emergency Meal Program for Children.

span.strong: Food Security and Meals Schedule Update:

p.span: Colchester Public Schools was recently approved to serve community-wide meals to âeligibleâ children, which is now defined as

any child 18 years old and younger. If you are 18 years old or younger, and live in Connecticut, you are eligible to receive breakfast and lunch from our school district. If you intend to participate in this food security program for breakfast and lunch, Monday through Friday from 9am to 11am at Bacon Academy, please complete this survey so we may plan
. Details and safety protocol used in the meals program are included in the survey and on the district website.

span.strong: Notice For the latest information, resources, and guidance related to coronavirus (COVID-19), visit ct.gov/coronavirus

strong.span: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

p.strong: Have a budget question for the Superintendent? Email your question to: budget@colchesterct.org

span.strong: Create Innovative Thinkers For A Dynamic World~

p.span: We will raise academic growth expectations for all students.
Students will develop innovative thinking and authentic problem-solving skills by engaging in rigorous tasks.
Our instruction and curriculum facilitate integrated, real-world learning that maximizes individual potential of each student.
We will increase our capacity to respond to student academic, emotional and social needs through partnerships with caregivers and the community.
We align the budget with the district vision and the needs of our students.

a.span: William J. Johnston Middle School Grades 6-8 Tel. 860.537.2313
Jack Jackter Intermediate School Grades 3-5 Tel. 860.537.9421

strong.span: Bacon Academy Tech Ed on the News!
